trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around August 17th 2008
Summary: longer than a large comercial airline twice as high almost see through look to it slightly gray.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and myself where returning from Jacksonville traveling on I4 at the 75 junction at around 3:30pm . the craft with no wings or tail noticable was above the Tampa international airport it looked larger than comercial aircraft frissbee shape with a slightly reflective almost see through look plus partly cloudy at the time sky was blue where the object was. my son told me he saw exactlly what I was looking at. and it wasn't there a minute later as I almost wrecked trying to take sharp turn and keep my eyes on it after the turn we could not see it anywhere, we saw planes further and closer and you could see wings and tails on all them. now my son believes in UFO's myself included
